answeredQuestions.target-users: Evaluator, Python Developer, Existing Codebase Adopter, Devcontainer User, Windows Developer, Non-Python Developer
answeredQuestions.core-problem: TeamBot requires cloning source repository, creating adoption friction
answeredQuestions.success-metrics: pip install works, uvx works, devcontainer < 60s, Windows support
answeredQuestions.testing-approach: CI/CD testing of installation methods on all platforms
answeredQuestions.scope-boundaries: PyPI, uvx, devcontainer, Docker; excluding binaries, Homebrew, Chocolatey
answeredQuestions.distribution-methods: PyPI (copilot-teambot), uvx, devcontainer feature, Docker image
answeredQuestions.constraints: Cannot bundle Copilot CLI, must work with github-copilot-sdk

referencesProcessed.keyFindings: 6 personas defined, 6 goals identified, scope and constraints documented
